comments.body: What if namespace, as provided by the user, is empty?  Do we reject incoming pods or do we assume a default?  The latter is way more friendly.
when a user POSTs a pod, I guess they already post to a namespaced path?  Does this mean /pods is dead, or that /pods is an alias to /namespaces/default/pods?
